// Waking Vigil (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Hitmark/Truesight + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC  Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing. Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible tags:god-pvp

// Waking Vigil (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Hitmark/Truesight + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC  Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing. Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible tags:pvp

// Fatebringer (Timelost) (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly  Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.  Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer. Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions Good PvE Combos: Explosive + Frenzy Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly Osmosis + AJ (?) Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks Rewind + Kill Clip Explosive + Kill Clip  tags:god-pve

dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,3824105627

Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions Good PvE Combos: Explosive + Frenzy Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly Osmosis + AJ (?) // Fatebringer (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly  Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.  Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer. Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions Good PvE Combos: Explosive + Frenzy Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly Osmosis + AJ (?) Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks Rewind + Kill Clip Explosive + Kill Clip  tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,3824105627  

// Fatebringer (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot  Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range PvP “God Roll” Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=3250034553,3142289711,3038247973,47981717  

// Fatebringer (pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly  Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.  Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer. // Fatebringer (pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly  Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.  Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer. Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions Good PvE Combos: Explosive + Frenzy Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly Osmosis + AJ (?) // Hawkmoon (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged + Alloy Mag + Rangefinder/Killing Wind/Opening Shot/Eye of the Storm + Polymer Grip/ Combat Grip  Opening Shot is arguably the best in slot perk. Rangefinder is generally the go to (it does add ~3M of base range) but Hawkmoon is a run and gun weapon (in my opinion) - if you want range, run a 120 or Luna Faction boots. Opening Shot gives serious bonus to accuracy on ground and in air and helps guarantee landing the first crit (or 7 stack OHKO if you wait for perk to reset).  Moving Target is nearly worthless due to high base AA stat. tags:god-pvp
